SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config.server

Class ProxyRule

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.server.ProxyRule
public class ProxyRule extends Object
Represents a single proxy rule configuration.

This class provides type-safe access to proxy rule settings including matching patterns (IP, EHLO, MAIL, RCPT), destination configuration, authentication credentials, and direction filtering.

      This is a convenience method for simple configurations.

      Returns:
      First host string.

      Gets destination port.
      Returns:
      Port number.

      public boolean isTls()
      Checks if TLS should be used.
      Returns:
      true if TLS enabled, false otherwise.

    • getAction

      public String getAction()
      Gets action for non-matching recipients.
      Returns:
      Action string (accept, reject, or none).

    • getDirection

      public String getDirection()
      Gets direction filter.
      Returns:
      Direction string (both, inbound, or outbound).

    • matchesDirection

      public boolean matchesDirection(boolean isInbound)
      Checks if this rule matches the given direction.
      Parameters:
      isInbound - true if the session is inbound, false if outbound.
      Returns:
      true if the rule matches the direction, false otherwise.

    • getAuthUsername

      public String getAuthUsername()
      Gets authentication username.
      Returns:
      Username or null if not specified.

    • getAuthPassword

      public String getAuthPassword()
      Gets authentication password.
      Returns:
      Password or null if not specified.

    • getAuthMechanism

      public String getAuthMechanism()
      Gets authentication mechanism.
      Returns:
      Auth mechanism (default: PLAIN).

    • hasAuth

      public boolean hasAuth()
      Checks if authentication is configured.
      Returns:
      true if both username and password are set, false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Generates a hash code for this ProxyRule.

      Used for connection reuse - rules with the same destination configuration will generate the same hash code, allowing connection pooling.

      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      Hash code based on destination configuration.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if this ProxyRule equals another object.

      Two ProxyRules are equal if they have the same destination configuration, allowing connection reuse for identical proxy destinations.

      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - Object to compare.
      Returns:
      true if the rules have the same destination configuration.
